TopicTitle: Docking ports exploding after timewarp/physics warp

Articles.Content:
Hey all!

On a ship I have an upside down docking port attached to a 1.25m separatron (docking port is part of a station piece, attached to a transfer stage), whever I timewarp or physics warp, coming out causes the docking port to explode, thereby ending the mission. Is this a common bug or related to a mod?

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement may be to blame...
